_header: The prince of priests to him gan say
_description: The stoning of St. Stephen — 87 lines in cross-rhymed quatrains

CantAdd68.First Lines:
The prince of prestes to hym gan sayArn these now trew wyth oute
                    lesto hym stevyn answeryd nayHym wel excusyng be fayr
                    processe…
CantAdd68.Last Lines:
…O good Ihesu for þis knythGraunte vs grace to come to
                    hevyn& make vs pertyners of þat lyghtWhere evyr we may regne
                    with stevyn
CantAdd68.Editions:
Woodruff,  Charles Eveleigh. 
             A XVth Century Guide Book to the Principal Churches of Rome Compiled c.
                1470 by William Brewyn.
         London: Marshall, 1933: 84-6.
